text: McCarthy behind move to kick Pelosi out of her office, sources say — so he can move into it  —  Kevin McCarthy was behind interim Speaker Patrick McHenry's move to kick former House Speaker Nancy Pelosi and former Majority Leader Steny Hoyer out of their office spaces, two Republican sources told CNN.
